feature.label: iSphere Task Tags for WDSC 7.0 (optional)
feature.description: The "iSphere Task Tags Plugin" adds task tags to the Lpex editor. Task tags, such as TODO, FIXME, etc. are used to add markers to your source code in order to remind you that something needs to be done or fixed.
